long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You Shop. Brands Donate. 

Automatically convert your shopping activity into social impact with the click of a button.

Do you care about Climate Change. Quality Education, Gender Equality, Animal Rights. Human Rights, Disease Prevention or ...?

Whenever you shop online from your favourite retailers and brands, do you know you can generate significant donations for any Cause you care for?

How?

We've partnered with leading brands and retailers to donate a percentage of anything you buy to a Cause or Charity of your choice. The donation is at no additional cost to you!
Click on the addon button whenever you are shopping at a partner store to activate The Giving Loop.

 Why?

Giving Loop is about innovative partnerships. Brands, Shoppers and Causes working together to meet the United Nations Sustainability Goals of 2030.

A peaceful, more equal, happier, more educated, more innovative future is good for all humanity and is good for business as wellâ€”a win-win for everyone.

Brands like Nike, Puma, Booking.com, ASOS, Boohoo, PrettyLittleThing, Asics, Net-A-Porter, Audible and 1500+ other brands are already on Spendow. We grow daily.
